## DeepValueOf type

Get deep values of T

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type DeepValueOf<T> = {
  [K in Keys<T>]: T[K] extends infer V
    ? V extends V
      ? IsObject<V> extends true
        ? T[K] | DeepValueOf<T[K]>
        : T[K]
      : never
    : never
}[Keys<T>]
```
<b>References:</b> [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)<!-- -->, [IsObject](./types-kit.isobject.md)<!-- -->, [DeepValueOf](./types-kit.deepvalueof.md)

## Example


```ts
 interface Props {
      a?: {
        d: () => void
      }
      b: string
      c: boolean
    }

 // Expect: { d: () => void } | (() => void) | string | boolean | undefined
 type PropValues = DeepValueOf<Props>
```
